value.title: Don’t trust reported TOPS metrics for deep learning
value.excerpt: Reported tera operations per second (TOPS) is an exaggerated performance number that most neural networks will never see under real-world conditions.

value.title: New cheat software claims to work on ‘any console’ via machine learning
value.excerpt: A new piece of cheat software claims to utilise machine learning to allow players to use auto aim on “any console”.
